alert.note: Alert for Wind River Basin (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 19 at 3:59PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Fremont County through 430 PM MDT... At 359 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles southeast of Hidden Valley, which is also 15 miles south of Shoshoni, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of east central Fremont County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
